messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We're hiring a HOP, come to HOP line to get your promotion you gays

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Actually we have one now for some reason

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It's punch a clown day, make sure to hurt him but not kill him as thats a no no

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Make sure you don't kill him, or if you do clone him will ya?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hit the clown day is over until further notice, where he's fixed and mentally stable

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There's a crazed pen stabber on ship and he made me fucking ill

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You smell like gay lmao

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: No you do not. Also, the captain smell like gay.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
HAIKUIS ARE GAY





(just kidding express yourself)

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The gods in this ship are hella homo, I think one of them sent down a angel, that was a girl infact, and touched my cunt

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: IF YOU SAY SHIT LIKE THAT AGAIN I SWEAR WE WILL BOMB THE BRIDGE

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Gods are gay

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: DID YOU DOUBT US BECUASE THAT WAS A BAD IDEA IF YOU DID

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: DAMN RIGHT WE DID CLOWN MAN

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You didn't have to break one square man, that was my favourite square you fucker

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: SPELL H

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I take it back the gods aren't gay, and if they are that's okay, it's not harming anyone to be gay

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Big boners down the lane, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I DON'T FEEL SO GOOD

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheri:%ï¿½ MCayj^j<.3-BZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo gods, can we have something fun happen?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Corgi parties are needed, if the gods won't do it. I'll have to buy a fuck ton of corgi crates

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Construction Area.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Sorry crew, I might of spent all our money on one single corgi

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Maintenance.
